title: Universities at war
creator_credit: Stanley Jackson, Graham McInnes and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Canadian universities made many contributions to the war effort through research and applications in many disciplines including engineering, medicine, psychiatry, chemistry, agriculture and sociology. Many of these developments were also envisioned as having important peacetime applications.
